MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub

Output control

Description

Parameters

  • Export mode
    • Description:
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: All together
    • Choices:
      • All together
      • Group by metadata
      • Individual files
      • None
  • Metadata item for grouping
    • Description:
    • Type: MetadataItemP
    • Default value:
  • Export summary
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Summary mode
    • Description:
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Per input file
    • Choices:
      • Per input file
      • Per timepoint per input file
  • Show object counts
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Show number of children
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Calculate count means
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Calculate count minima
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Calculate count maxima
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Calculate count standard deviations
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Calculate count sums
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Export individual objects
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Continuous data export
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
  • Save every n files
    • Description:
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 10
  • Append date/time mode
    • Description:
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Never
    • Choices:
      • Always
      • If file exists
      • Never
  • Show measurement selection
    • Description:
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
